data.text: On May 19, Markle married Prince Harry. On November 8, 2016, the British royal family's communications secretary released an official statement that addressed a "wave of abuse and harassment" directed toward Markle. -Katie Lou

In 2016, Meghan Markle became an ambassador for World Vision Canada, traveling to Rwanda for a Clean Water Campaign, which ultimately aims to provide safe and clean drinking water. As well as this, she traveled to India to raise awareness of issues concerning women.

Meghan is an outspoken feminist, and addresses gender inequality. Her website The Tig features a column of influential women. Her humanitarian work represented international charity organizations. She received recognition for fashion and style, releasing a clothing line in 2016.
